ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
des:
"The feta cheese gives this pimento cheese spread a little extra flavor. Grating the cheese by hand gives this spread a creamier texture than using bagged shredded cheese. 

"
ins: Stir together the Cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, feta cheese, pimentos, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper in a bowl; cover. Refrigerate at least 1 hour.
